definitions.definition: An emoji used to express a reaction to a post on social media.
To act or perform a second time; to do over again; to reenact.
To return an impulse or impression; to resist the action of another body by an opposite force
definitions.example: Every body reacts on the body that impels it from its natural state.

definitions.definition: To act upon each other; to exercise a reciprocal or a reverse effect, as two or more chemical agents; to act in opposition.
To cause chemical agents to react; to cause one chemical agent to react with another.
